text: We are 6 months to 1 year away from almost all the code to be written by AI. All if you think about factories, right? Most of our factories had the ability to be autonomous already. The reason why we have humans in a factory even though it's fully autonomous is because we wanted a human to turn on the switch, turn off the switch and kind of look at the machine to see that oh everything is going okay. Okay, fine. That's the job. One person can write code equivalent of 20 people at a quality of a best engineer. Correct. Would companies still rely in Indian companies to write code anymore?
